title: shen
body:
i played the reworked shen for the first time today. (yea i know I'm behind) and all i got to say is why did riot have to try and fix something that was not broken, should have just left him alone.
 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Hate new shen, old shen was bae, old shen was life, old shen was the reason i played.
I was of the same opinion when he came out, Shen is my main top laner, but now i actually like the new Shen much more then the old one.
